bibl.title: Greek and Demotic Accounts on a Papyrus at the Bodleian Library Oxford.
bibl.note: Recto (Greek text): account dealing with funerary procedures (from a burial club?). Provenance unknown, late first or early second century A.D. - Verso (Demotic text): accounts. Second century A.D.

bibl.title: The Two Faces of Graeco-Roman Egypt. Greek and Demotic and Greek-Demotic Texts and Studies Presented to P.W. Pestman

bibl.seg: THOMAS J. David and W. John TAIT, Greek and Demotic Accounts on a Papyrus at the Bodleian Library Oxford.

A.M.F.W. VERHOOGT and S.P. VLEEMING (Edd.), The Two Faces of Graeco-Roman Egypt. Greek and Demotic and Greek-Demotic Texts and Studies Presented to P.W. Pestman = Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXX (Leiden, 1998) pp. 93-125, 1 fig. et pll. IV-V.
Recto (Greek text): account dealing with funerary procedures (from a burial club?). Provenance unknown, late first or early second century A.D. - Verso (Demotic text): accounts. Second century A.D.
